title: How to Activate Hulu with Spotify Student

steps.title: Log in at https://www.spotify.com/us/student/.
steps.content: Log in at https://www.spotify.com/us/student/ . This is your student account for Spotify, and you'll be adding a Hulu account. This method only works for those who have a Student Spotify Premium account but not a Hulu account. If you have Hulu, skip to the next method.

steps.title: Click your profile icon and select Account.
steps.content: Click your profile icon and select Account . The profile icon is at the top-right corner of the page.

steps.title: Click Activate Hulu.
steps.content: Click Activate Hulu . You'll see this at the bottom of the "Account Overview" page.

steps.title: Complete the required fields to activate your Hulu account.
steps.content: Complete the required fields to activate your Hulu account. This includes your name, email, and billing information. Once you complete your Hulu account set-up, you'll be billed for all these services with your normal Spotify bill, so all your payments are in one subscription. This is the basic, ad-supported Hulu subscription.

steps.title: Log in at https://www.spotify.com/us/student/.
steps.content: Log in at https://www.spotify.com/us/student/ . This is your student account for Spotify. You'll need to make sure your email address is the same for your Spotify and Hulu accounts so you can successfully merge them. Use this method if you already have a Spotify Premium Student account and a Hulu account separately. This will not work unless you have the basic, ad-supported Hulu subscription.

steps.title: Click your profile icon and select Account.
steps.content: Click your profile icon and select Account . The profile icon is at the top-right corner of the page.

steps.title: Click Activate Hulu.
steps.content: Click Activate Hulu . You'll see this at the bottom of the "Account Overview" page.

steps.title: Switch to Spotify Premium for Students + Hulu.
steps.content: Switch to Spotify Premium for Students + Hulu. Follow the on-screen instructions to switch to the new combined plan. [1] X Research source Once you enter and submit the requested information, you'll receive an email confirmation of the change.
